data.lyric:
[ti:Christmas (Baby Please Come Home)]
[ar:Darlene Love]
[al:Christmas (Baby Please Come Home)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Christmas (Baby Please Come Home) - Darlene Love (达琳·洛芙)
[00:16.48]Christmas
[00:18.10]The snow's coming down
[00:20.19]Christmas
[00:21.58]I'm watching it fall
[00:23.94]Christmas
[00:25.47]Lots of people around
[00:27.84]Christmas
[00:29.29]Baby please come home
[00:31.66]Christmas
[00:32.89]The church bells in town
[00:35.32]Christmas
[00:36.60]All ringing in song
[00:39.13]Christmas
[00:40.31]Full of happy sounds
[00:42.94]Christmas
[00:44.37]Baby please come home
[00:46.48]
[00:47.10]They're singing deck the halls
[00:50.40]
[00:50.96]But it's not like Christmas at all
[00:53.91]
[00:54.75]'Cause I remember when you were here
[00:58.04]
[00:58.59]And all the fun we had last year
[01:01.99]Christmas
[01:03.23]Pretty lights on the tree
[01:05.55]Christmas
[01:06.87]I'm watching them shine
[01:09.38]Christmas
[01:10.58]You should be here with me
[01:13.28]Christmas
[01:14.60]Baby please come home
[01:17.03]
[01:32.47]They're singing deck the halls
[01:35.91]
[01:36.44]But it's not like Christmas at all
[01:39.70]
[01:40.21]'Cause I remember when you were here
[01:43.98]And all the fun we had last year
[01:47.33]Christmas
[01:48.74]If there was a way
[01:51.10]Christmas
[01:52.35]I'd hold back this tear
[01:54.79]Christmas
[01:56.10]But it's Christmas day
[01:59.09]Please
[01:59.70]Please
[02:00.66]Please
